scripts.build: npm run build --prefix 300x50 && npm run build --prefix 300x600 && npm run build --prefix 728x90 && npm run build --prefix 970x250_v1 && npm run build --prefix 970x250_v2
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix 300x50" "npm run start --prefix 300x600" "npm run start --prefix 728x90" "npm run start --prefix 970x250_v1" "npm run start --prefix 970x250_v2"
